title: new​
content: </> ProjectileCaster.new(Settings:: { Size: number?, Speed: number?, MaxDistance: number?, Visual: Instance? , Config: ModuleScript? , Ignore: {Instance }?, Debug: boolean? }) → ProjectileCaster Creates a new ProjectileCaster instance.

title: Cast​
content: </> ProjectileCaster:Cast( Start:: Vector3 , Direction:: Vector3 , VisualOverride:: Instance? ) → Projectile Casts a new projectile in the game world. VisualOverride is an optional parameter that allows you to override the default visual of the projectile. VisualOverride must be a descendant of ReplicatedStorage.

title: Hit​
content: </> Projectile.Hit: Signal Signal that fires when the projectile hits an object. Projectile.Hit:Connect(function(Object: Instance, Position: Vector3, Normal: Vector3) -- Code end)

title: new​
content: </> Projectile.new(Data:: {[string]: any}) → Projectile Creates a new Projectile instance.

title: GetDirection​
content: </> Projectile:GetDirection() → Vector3  Returns the direction of the projectile.

title: Destroy​
content: </> Projectile:Destroy() → () Destroys the projectile. this method will destroy the projectile and all of its connections. It's auto called if there is a max distance specified and the projectile reaches it.
